verses.text: \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* waked \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* wakened \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* seest thou? \w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* candlestick \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* lights thereof \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* funnels \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lights \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H3225"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lamp, \w and|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: Knowest thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w*? \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zorobabel, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* art thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Zorobabel? thou shalt \w become|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*: \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* chief \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* give equal \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Zorobabel \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w finish|strong="H1214"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w despised|strong="H0936"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*? \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tin|strong="H0913"\w* plummet \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Zorobabel. \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* run \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fro \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3225"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3225"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* candlestick, \w and|strong="H3225"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* thereof?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w branches|strong="H7641"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* beaks, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* funnels \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Knowest thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w*? \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
